item.title: :anchor: Install
item.description: ğŸº Homebrew beacher supports installation via Homebrew. $ brew tap tamadalab/brew $ brew install beacher ğŸ’ª Install yourself Clone the project from GitHub and compile it like follows. $ git clone https://github.com/tamadalab/beacher.git $ cd beacher $ cargo build --release Then, cargo build the resultant beacher executable on target/release directory.

item.title: :runner: Usage
item.description: CLI beacher 1.0.0 TAMADAlab A tool for detecting build tools of the projects USAGE: beacher [OPTIONS] [PROJECTs]... ARGS: <PROJECTs>... The target project directories for beacher. OPTIONS: -@ <INPUT> Specify the file contains project path list. If INPUT is dash ('-'), read from STDIN. --append-defs <DEFS_JSON> Specify the additional definitions of the build tools. -d, --definition <DEFS_JSON> Specify the definition of the build tools. -f, --format <FORMAT> Specify the output format [default: default] [possible values: default, json, yaml, xml] -h, --help Print help information -L, --list-defs Print the build tools' definition list --no-ignore Do not respect ignore files (.
